### Direct Emissions from Managed Soils - N2O (CRF Source Category 3D1) 
```{r 3D1,results='hide',warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
cursec<-"3.D.1"
curseclong<-""
curcat<-"Direct N2O Emissions From Managed Soils"
source("nircatdata.r")
figs("figD1share",sharefigurecaption(eukp,cursec,lastyear))
tabs(paste0("tab",cursec,"mscontr"),msconttablecaption())
```
`r curgas` emissions from source category `r cursec` `r curseclong` are `r percent(eushareghg,1)` of total `r eukp` GHG emissions and `r percent(eusharen2o)` of total `r eukp` `r curgas` emissions. They make `r percent(eushareagrighg,1)` of total agricultural emissions. The main sub-categories are `r subcateg$sector_number[1]` (`r subcateg$category[1]`),  `r subcateg$sector_number[2]` (`r subcateg$category[2]`) and `r subcateg$sector_number[3]` (`r subcateg$category[3]`) as shown in `r figs("figD1share",display="cite")`.

`r figs("figD1share",display="full")`
